channel.title: Tutorials [PI]
channel.description:
Hello Guys I Think Some Of This Has Been Released But Ill Release It Again.
1) Pkpoint Adding 2) Donator Rank 3) Quest Tab Cleaned And Auto Update 4) 5)
1) Pkpoint Adding Dificulty - EASY
Go Into Player.java And Search For [code]pcPoints[/code]
And Add This Under It [code]killPoints,[/code]
Save Then Go Into Playersave.java And Search For [code]pcPoints[/code]
Copy The pcPoints And PLACE IT UNDER.
Search pcPoints A Second Time And Do The Same Thing.
(IF YOU DID IT WRONG YOU PROBABLY DID NOT CHANGE pcPoints, And pc-points TO killPoints)
Save And Then Go Into PlayerAssistant.java
And Search For [code]public void applydead[/code]
Then You Should See [code]You Have Defeated (player name)[/code]
Then Add This UNDER It [code]o.killPoint += 1;[/code]
2, 3, 4, and 5 will be added soon GTG :)
